title: MarshallP
author: MarshallP
content: Hello ladies and gentleman! Looks like I am the most recent victim of this scam. My story goes exactly as dozens before me. I was mining to this wallet for years. Its finally enough money to justify a more secure method of storage. I bought a Trezor hardware wallet and attempted to move my funds to the new wallet. Apparently trying to withdraw my coins was suspicious activity and got my account suspended. I jumped through all of the silly hoops to prove I am me and where the coins came from (mining). Now the ticket is sitting with the security team, and each time I ask for an update they say that they cant provide a time frame and that I should continue to wait. I asked for a phone number or address for Frewallet and they tell me that they cannot provide any of that information and the only way to contact them is through email. Currently at 38 emails and I still do not have my coins released. I have proven my identity, and provided transaction hashes for the dozens of transactions deposited into the wallet. Its at the point where there are no more "gotcha" questions and are now just telling me that my request is being processed. Please do yourself a favor and if you have and funds on this service remove it immediately and if you were thinking of using the service you should not walk, but run away.Your ticket ID is 456898

comments.author: xenaga
comments.body: I just got scammed today too...luckily it was only $50. Looks like a lot of people here have been scammed, some for hundreds of thousands of dollars.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.created_time: February 10, 2023, 07:52:58 PMLast edit: July 19, 2023, 08:21:12 PM by logfiles
comments.body: Sorry about that bad ordeal with the scam wallet. So many complaints have come up against them here, How I wish you had seen them and tried to avoid using the wallet a long time agoHere is a compilation of some of the accusations against them until May 2020. Imagine how many they could be after 3 more years-- Freewallet.org SCAM accusations - a compilation Their reputation here is pretty bad too

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Here again yet another complaint and accusation. This is the second l have set my eyes upon within a short time interval today. It is unfortunate that you got scammed of your hard earned resources by this scammer. For the first time I saw the above trust feedback of them and from what I am seeing, it is being long time the scammer was active maybe they discovered that their tricks been exposed so the ran away. Your complaint and accusation against them is nothing different from the truth based on the findings here and reports coming in but if you can as well upload evidence for us to see that would also go along way to so that they can not counter your claims if they eventually show up to clean up their mess.

comments.author: SafuBTC
comments.body: What is going on here? Are people still using free wallet this day? Are you not warned several times not to use custodial wallets? There are way many posts on this forum pointing to the likes of free wallet and others that gives you zero private keys and only use email and password to log-in. People will never learn it seems.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: SafuBTC on February 10, 2023, 09:21:47 PMWhat is going on here? Are people still using free wallet this day? Are you not warned several times not to use custodial wallets? There are way many posts on this forum pointing to the likes of free wallet and others that gives you zero private keys and only use email and password to log-in. People will never learn it seems. There are already unresolved complaints on Freewallet and it goes back to 2017 every year there are more adding to these accusations this is why Freewallet never take down their website because they always have a supply of victims because people like OP love to use custodial wallets and are not doing their research.The whole Crypto community always warn against the use of custodial wallet but so many people still ignore these warnings they will only stop when they face problems like this.
